amendment.description: An amendment numbered 125 printed in Part A of House Report 118-216 to increase and decrease by $10 million for research, development, test and evaluation for the Space Force with the intent that the $10 million will be used for Single-Stage-to- Orbit Propulsion Research.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Norton amendment (A006) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Norton amendment (A006) Failed by voice vote.
